headline: A Homecoming Heaped in Ash And Heartache
abstract: At least 30,000 people have fled since a mammoth eruption in the Philippines, and a new blast is feared. These islanders went back anyway.
lead_paragraph: TAAL VOLCANO, Philippines â€” The gray ash is knee-deep. It covers homes, trees and the bloated cadavers of cows and horses, their limbs protruding at unnatural angles in the shadow of a brooding volcano that could re-explode at any moment.
